name: Dragon SHMUP Game
description:
Z to shoot

X to switch extra dragons on or off

While extra dragons are on they can shoot while they're off they cant shoot but are also immune to bullets

Extra Dragons die in one hit while the main Dragon has three lives

There are 3 Dragon types acting as the 3 Upgrades

There are 11 waves and then the game just kinda ends

First time using Unity so the game is very rough but I learned a lot a lot of stuff

Thanks for playing!
